title: Celmund
description: CELMUND I have waited my whole life to meet the woman that will give meaning to my life, but when i finally meet her the odds are against us. I will not allow for anything to come between us, they think they can take her from me but hell will come knocking on their door if they persist, because she's now mine and nothing or no one will dare touch her.  TALIA I have lived my adult life running, but when i finally meet Celmund all the pieces fall into place. He calms me like nothing else can, he says that i belong to him and that all will be fine. I want to trust him but will my demons come calling, and if they do can i live with myself if anything happens to Celmund, or anyone at the MC.
author: Alexi Ferreira
